```{r}
directories <- "data/STINGseq-v1_GDO"

grna=matrix_data[36601:36810,]
```

```{r}
data_files <- list.files("data/STINGSqr-v1_GDO", full.names = TRUE)
output_files <- list.files("output/sceptre_outputs", full.names = TRUE)
analysis_files <- list.files("analysis", pattern = "*.Rmd", full.names = TRUE)

# Combine all file lists
all_files <- c(data_files, output_files, analysis_files)

# Publish all files
wflow_publish(all_files, message = "publish data")
```
